abort.reconfigure_successful:
**Reconfiguration was successful**

Go to the webhook feature in Geofency and update the webhook with the following settings:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up the webhook feature in Geofency.

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.

reconfigure.description: Are you sure you want to reconfigure the Geofency webhook?
reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Geofency webhook

user.description: Are you sure you want to set up the Geofency webhook?
